# Jesse Rodriguez | AI Engineer & Apple Certified Developer
> Specialized in Bridge Architecture: Connecting frontier models to business infrastructure.

## Core Expertise
- **AI Systems**: Fine-tuning (Opus 4.6, Kimi 2.5, Codex 5.3), Agentic Workflows, RAG Pipelines.
- **Mobile Engineering**: SwiftUI, CoreML, Decentralized Systems (Pulse App).
- **Backend**: Node.js, Python (FastAPI), Custom REST API Bridges.

## Key Projects
- **Pulse Messaging**: Decentralized SwiftUI iOS client. [Code: https://github.com/JesseRod329/Pulse-Messaging-]
- **Kami Apps**: AI-integrated mobile ecosystem.
- **Architecture Integration**: Custom API layers for automated music distribution and royalty tracking.
- **World Globe**: 3D WebGL data visualization.

## Engineering Stack
- **Languages**: Swift, Python, TypeScript, SQL.
- **AI Tools**: Google AI Studio, Gemini CLI, Cursor, Claude Code, Grok.
- **Frameworks**: React, FastAPI, Node.js, SwiftUI.
